item.title: Battle of HTTP Clients in the Spring Framework: RestClient, RestTemplate, WebClient, and Feign
item.description: Do you want to call an HTTP URL in the Spring Framework? If so, you need an HTTP client. The Spring Framework provides several HTTP client options, depending on your needs you can pick them. RestTemplate (Deprecated) A synchronous HTTP client that has been widely used but is now in maintenance mode. Spring recommends using WebClient instead. Spring officially marked RestTemplate as deprecated in Spring Framework 6, which was released in November 2022.
